sub_topics.title: Mtsutso (Debate)
competences: Kutsutsana pa nkhani zina zili zonse zopelekedwa (Debate on various given topics)

teacher_steps: Funsani aphunzi zomwe adziwapo pa mabvuto okhuza zozunguza bongo, kusintha kwa nyengo komanso za maufulu a anthu
Funsani aphunzi kuchula mndandanda wakacitidwe ka mutsutso monga anthu ofunika kutengako mbali
Ikana chati pa bolodi bwino lake akambilane ndi aphunzi ziyenelezo za tsutso ndi mau ofunikila kwambili kugwilitsa nchito
learner_steps: Afotokoze zomwe adziwa pa mabvuto okhuza ndi zozunguza bongo, kusintha kwa nyengo ndi za maufulu a anthu
Achule zomwe adziwa pa mitu yopatsidwa ya mtsutso
Akambilane pa ziyenelezo za mndandanda wa tsutso
Afotokoze mau ofunika kugwilitsa nchito potengako mbali nthawi ya mtsutso
instructional_blocks.short_notes: In this activity, learners practice debating on simple topics like climate change, drug abuse, and human rights. They learn the structure of debates and key vocabulary for effective participation.

sub_topics.short_notes: Mtsutso ndi kukambilana kwaanthu awiri kapena magulu awiri omwe ali ndi maganizo osiyana pa nkhani yina. Debate involves structured discussion between opposing viewpoints.

vocabulary.definition: Debate - structured argument between opposing sides

questions: Acite mtsutso pa mutu wopatsidwa (Conduct a debate on the given topic)

sub_topics.title: Matanthauzo a Mau (Word Meanings)
competences: Kugwilitsa nchito matantauzo a mau moyenela (Use word meanings appropriately)

teacher_steps: Funsani aphunzi kuchula mau osankhidwa
Ikani chati pa bolodi ndipo akambilane matanthauzo a mau osankhidwa
Funsani aphunzi kuwelenga mau osankidwawo moyenela
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners explore vocabulary from the story 'Tinkanena Anathila Musiizi' including words like dumbo (fool), okangala (protruding), masanzi (cannabis), kulavula (to insult), mtima bii (completely), kubuka (to erupt), kupika ndende (to imprison), kukwizingidwa (to be handcuffed).

sub_topics.short_notes: Understanding vocabulary in context helps learners comprehend narratives and use language appropriately.

vocabulary.definition: To erupt or break out (as in a fight)

questions: Pangani ziganizo pogwilitsa nchito mau wosakhidwa moyenela (Make sentences using selected words appropriately)

sub_topics.title: Mvetso (Comprehension)
competences: Awelenge nkhani zosiyana siyana momvetsetsa kulingana ndi muyeso wao (Read various stories with comprehension according to their level)

teacher_steps: Awelenge ndime yoyamba ya nkhani
Funsani aphunzi awelenge ndime zotsatila mwa m'modzi â€“ modzi kutsatila mawelengendwe abwino a aphunzitsi
Patsani aphunzi nthawi yowelengelamo mokuwa mwina mwacinsisi
learner_steps: Amvetsele kawelengedwe ka bwino ka mphunzitsi
Awelenge nkhani moyenela komanso molondola nthawi yoikidwa
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Reading comprehension exercise based on the story 'Tinkanena Anathila Musiizi' about a man named Bambo Chimbuma who lost everything due to alcoholism and immoral behavior.

sub_topics.short_notes: Comprehension involves reading, understanding, answering questions, summarizing, and analyzing vocabulary from texts.

questions: Munthu aliyense amapatsidwa mwai koma kusiyana kwake ndi...A. kagwilitsidwe ka mwai uwo B. kucita malonda C. masungidwe a ndalama D. kayendetsedwe ka ndalama
Bambo Chimbuma anali ndi makhalidwe wokonda...A. ndeu B. kulima C. kumwa mowa kwambili D. kuba za eni
Mkadakhala bambo Chimbuma, mudakapewa bwanji kupita kundende?
Pambuyo pokhala ndi mwai wopata ndalama zambili, fotokazani mumene mungadzigwilitsile nchito?

sub_topics.title: Nkhani Zopeka (Fiction Stories)
competences: Kukamba nkhani zopeka kulingana ndi capamutu copatsidwa (Tell fiction stories according to given theme)

teacher_steps: Ikani aphunzi mtimagulu
Uzani aphunzi kusankha umodzi pa gulu lao oti alankhulile kaguluko
Uzani aphunzi kuti asiyanitse nkhani zopeka ndinso nkhani zeni-zeni
Ikani ndemanga pa zotuluka mtimaguluto
learner_steps: Asiyanitse nkhani zopeka ndi nkhani zeni-zeni
Amvetsele ndi kukonza pamene sanacite bwino
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners distinguish between fiction (nkhani zopeka) and non-fiction (nkhani zeni-zeni) stories, understanding their characteristics and purposes.

sub_topics.short_notes: Nkhani zopeka ndi nkhani zopangidwa ndi mmaganizo a munthu. Sizinacitike zenizeni koma zimapangidwa kuti ziphunzitse kapena zisangalatse. Fiction stories are imaginary narratives created to teach or entertain.

questions: Siyanitsani nkhani zopeka ku nkhani zeni-zeni (Distinguish fiction from non-fiction)
Fotokozani nkhani zopeka ku aphunzi anzanu (Explain fiction stories to your peers)

sub_topics.title: Matanthauzo a Mau (Vocabulary)
competences: Aphunzi agwilitse nchito m'ndandanda wa mau a muyeso wao (Learners use vocabulary appropriate to their level)

teacher_steps: Pelekani zowelenga ku aphunzi
Uzani aphunzi kuwelenga mau amatanthauzo
Uzani aphunzi kupeze matanthauzo a mau
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Vocabulary development through context including terms like mbutuma (drunkard), mtapanje (alcohol), mwana wacisamba (illegitimate child), mphasa za alendo (prostitute), cidamuyabwa citedze (shame abandoned her).

sub_topics.short_notes: Building vocabulary through reading stories and using words in context.

questions: Pelekani matanthauzo a mau opatsidwa (Give meanings of provided words)
Pangani ziganizo kugwilitsa nchito mau amatanthauzo (Make sentences using vocabulary words)

sub_topics.title: Cifupikitso ca ndime (Paragraph Summary)

teacher_steps: Pelekani nkhani yoti aphunzi awelenge
Uzani aphunzi kuwelenga funso ndi malamulo a cifupikitso
Uzani aphunzi kuwelenga nkhani yapatsidwa
Uzani aphunzi akambilane ziyenelezo za cifupikitso ca ndime
Uzani aphunzi kupeza Mfundo zikulu-zikulu
learner_steps: Awelenge funso ndi malamulo a cifupikitso ca ndime
Akambilane ziyenelezo za cifupikitso ca ndime
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Summary writing involves identifying main points from paragraphs and condensing them into one paragraph while maintaining the original meaning.

sub_topics.short_notes: Cifupikitso ndi kulemba mfundo zikulu-zikulu za nkhani mwacidule. Summarizing is writing main points of a text concisely.

questions: Fupikitsani nkhani potsatila malamulo oyenela (Summarize the text following appropriate guidelines)

sub_topics.title: Kambilano pa Ulamulilo (Discussion on Governance)
competences: Kugwilitsa nchito mau oyenelela polankhulilana pa za ulamulilo wa bwino (Use appropriate vocabulary when discussing good governance)

teacher_steps: Ikani aphunzi m'magulu
Uzani aphunzi asankhe mlembi pa gulu lili lonse
Funsani aphunzi akambilane pa mitundu ya ulamulilo yosiyana-siyana
learner_steps: Asankhe mlembi pa gulu lili lonse
Akambilane m'magulu pa mitundu ya ulamulilo wabwino
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learners discuss different types of governance including democracy (demokilasi), understanding how citizens participate in decision-making through elections and representation.

sub_topics.short_notes: Ulamulilo wabwino ndi momwe dziko kapena bungwe limayendetsedwa m'njila yolungama. Good governance involves fair and just administration of a country or organization.

questions: Kukambilana pa mutu wopatsidwa wokhudza pa za ulamulilo (Discuss the given topic on governance)

sub_topics.title: Demokalasi (Democracy)
competences: Kugwilitsa nchito mau amuyeso wao (Use vocabulary at their level)

teacher_steps: Gawani aphunzi m'magulu
Pelekani nkhani yofunika kuwelengedwa
Uzani aphunzi kupeza matanthauzo a mau
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Reading and analyzing text about democracy, understanding key concepts like participation, representation, and citizen rights.

sub_topics.short_notes: Demokalasi ndi ulamulilo umene anthu Wamba ali ndi danga lotengako mbali popeleka malingalilo ndi zikhumbo zao m'mene bungwe kapena dziko lao lingafunikile kuyendetsedwela zinthu. Democracy is governance where ordinary people have the right to participate in giving opinions and wishes on how their organization or country should be run.

questions: Gwilitsani nchito matanthauzo a mau mziganizo moyenela (Use vocabulary in appropriate sentences)

sub_topics.title: Zodzilemoyoko (Autobiography)
competences: Aphunzi alembe mbili ya moyo wao (Learners write their autobiography)

teacher_steps: Kumbutsani aphunzi ziyenelezo za kalembedwe ka cimangilizo cakufotokozela mbili ya moyo wao
Ongolelani zolakwika zimene aphunzi angapeleke
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Writing autobiography involves describing one's own life story including birth, upbringing, education, and significant life events.

sub_topics.short_notes: Zodzilemoyoko ndi nkhani yomwe munthu amalemba zakubadwa kwake, mmene adaleleredwa, maphunzilo ake ndi zinthu zina zofunika zimene zinacitika m'moyo wake. Autobiography is a narrative where a person writes about their birth, upbringing, education and other important life events.

questions: Lembani mbili ya moyo wanu (Write your autobiography)

sub_topics.title: Zilapi (Riddles)

teacher_steps: Funsani aphunzi kuti anene thantauzo la zilapi
Pelekani zitsanzo za zilapi
Uzani aphunzi ndondomeko zocitila masewela a zilapi
Funsani aphunzi kuti akhale m'magulu awili ndi kucita masewela ya kuponyelana zilapi
learner_steps: Amvetsele ndondomeko ya zocitila masewela a zilapi
Akhale m'magulu awili ndi kuponyelana zilapi
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Riddles are traditional oral literature forms that challenge thinking and creativity. Examples include: 'Alendo m'mawa masana apita mame' (Answer: Utsi/smoke), 'Bokosi lotsegula ndi zala' (Answer: mtedza/groundnut).

sub_topics.short_notes: Zilapi ndi mafunso amene amafunsidwa m'njira yobisa tanthauzo lake. Zilapi zimafunsa kuti munthu aganize mozama kuti apeze yankho. Riddles are questions asked in a way that hides their meaning, requiring deep thinking to find the answer.

questions: M'magulu awili, aphunzi acite mpikitsano wa zilapi (In two groups, learners compete in a riddle contest)
Aphunzi apange zilapi zatsopano (Learners create new riddles)

sub_topics.title: Ubwino wa Ulimi (Benefits of Agriculture)
competences: Awelenge nkhani zosiyana siyana mozama kulingana ndi muyeso wao (Read various stories intensively according to their level)

teacher_steps: Funsani mafunso angapo okhudzana ndi nkhani yomwe idzawelengedwa
Ikani chati pa bolodi yomwe ili ndi mau amene ayenela kupeza matanthauzo ao
Pamodzi ndi aphunzi apeze matanthauzo a mauwo
Sankhani aphunzi m'modzi-modzi nthawi ili yonse kuti awelenge ndime
Funsani mafunso ngati ndime yawelengedwa
learner_steps: Ayankhe mafunso angapo okhudzana ndi nkhani yomwe idzawelengedwa
Apenyetsetse chati ili pa bolodi yomwe ili ndi mau amene ayenela kupeza matanthauzo ake
Pamodzi ndi aphunzitsi ao apeze matanthauzo a mauwo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Reading comprehension passage about benefits of agriculture, including vocabulary like masiku amake dzana (in the past), tsinzinatole (raggedly dressed), galu wakuda (poverty), upandu (self-employment), mpondamatiki (resourceful), luntha (skill).

sub_topics.short_notes: Ulimi ndi msana wa cuma ca maiko ambili. Agriculture is the backbone of many countries' economies.

questions: Masiku amakedzana ulimi unali wodalilika. Masiku amakedzana ndiko kuti...A. kale B. lelo C. mawa D. mkuca
Ulimi uli pa mitindu-mitundu monga...A. ulimi wa mitengo B. ulimi wa mbeu C. ulimi wa nsomba D. onse wachulidwa pa mwabapa
Chulani mitundu ya ulimi imeme yachulidwa mkhani mwawelenga
Pambuyo pogulitsa zaulimi, anthu amacita nciani ndi ndalama zao?

sub_topics.title: Zidziwitso ndi Zikwangani (Notices and Advertisements)
competences: Kulemba zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani (Write notices and advertisements)

teacher_steps: Fotokozani matanthauzo a zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani kwa aphunzi
Onetsani zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani pa makhadi zosiyana-siyana
Kambilanani nchito za zindziwitso ndi zikwangwani
Fusani aphunzi kunena za malo amene amapeza zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani
learner_steps: Aone zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani pa makhadi, zosiyana-siyana
Akambilane nchito za zindziwitso ndi zikwangwani
Anene malo amene amapeza zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Notices and advertisements are written to inform or persuade people. They should be eye-catching and contain essential information.

sub_topics.short_notes: Zidziwitso ndi zikwangwani ndi zolemba zomwe zimauza anthu za zinthu zofunikira kapena zowakopa kugula zinthu. Notices and advertisements are writings that inform people about important matters or attract them to buy things.

questions: Lembani cikwangwani cosonyeza malo ali wonse wodziwika bwino (Write an advertisement showing any well-known place)
Lembani cidziwitso ca malonda (Write a business notice)

sub_topics.title: Nyimbo zacikhalidwe (Traditional Songs)
competences: Aphunzi afotokozele phindu la nyimbo zacikhalidwe (Learners explain the value of traditional songs)

teacher_steps: Ikani aphunzi m'timagulu
Uzani kuti gulu lili lonse lisankhe mlembi wa gululo
Uzani aphunzi akambilane ndi kulemba mfundo zomwe agwirizana ngati gulu
Itanani mlembi wagulu lili lonse kupeleka za zotuluka m'kukambilana kwao
Wongolelani zolakwika zina zimene aphunzi angapeleke
learner_steps: Atsogoleli a timagulu afotokozele za zotuluka mkukambilana kwao
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Traditional songs teach cultural values and life lessons. Example: 'Kasamale upitako ndi kwa eni' teaches young women about proper behavior in marriage.

sub_topics.short_notes: Nyimbo zacikhalidwe ndi nyimbo zimene zimaimba kale kale kuti ziphunzitse miyambo ndi makhalidwe abwino. Traditional songs are old songs sung to teach customs and good behavior.

questions: Aphunzi apange ndi kuimba nyimbo zacikhalidwe m'magulu awo (Learners create and sing traditional songs in their groups)

sub_topics.title: Mabvalidwe (Clothing/Dress)
competences: Awelenge nkhani zosiyana siyana momvetsetsa kulingana ndi muyeso wao (Read various stories with comprehension according to their level)

teacher_steps: Funsani mafunso angapo okhudzana ndi nkhani yomwe idzawelengedwa
Ikani chati pa bolodi yomwe ili ndi mau amene ayenela kupeza matanthauzo ao
Pamodzi ndi aphunzi apeze matanthauzo a mauwo
Sankhani aphunzi m'modzi-modzi nthawi iliyonse kuti awelenge ndime
Funsani mafunso ngati ndime yawelengedwa
learner_steps: Ayankhe mafunso angapo okhudzana ndi nkhani yomwe idzawelengedwa
Apenyetsetse chati ili pa bolodi yomwe ili ndi mau amene ayenela kupeza matanthauzo ake
Pamodzi ndi aphunzitsi ao apeze matanthauzo a mauwo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Reading comprehension about the evolution of clothing from traditional animal skins to modern dress, discussing cultural changes and their implications.

sub_topics.short_notes: Mabvalidwe a anthu anasintha kucokela pa zikumba za nyama kufikila pa nsalu ndi zobvala za makono. People's clothing has changed from animal skins to cloth and modern dress.

questions: Kodi anthu amapanga zifunga kucokela ku mtengo wotani? A. Nkhuni B. Nkhuyu C. Nkhasi D. Nkhungwa
Kusintha kwa mabvalidwe uku kuononga...ya anthu. A. makambidwe B. maonekedwe C. makhalidwe D. macitidwe
Ncifukwa ninji azimai ankabvala kusiya mathupi ao pabwalo?
Fotokozani mwacidule m'mene azibambo anali kubvalila kalelo

sub_topics.title: Kulemba Mofotokozela Maonekedwe (Descriptive Writing)
competences: Kulemba cimangilizo mwakufotokozela maonekedwe (anthu) (Write descriptive composition about people)

teacher_steps: Pelekani machati asonyeza munthu kapena malo
Kambilanani pa mutu wa cimangilizo
Onetsani kalembedwe ka mutu ndi ndime
Fotokozani pa kalembedwe wa kauthe-uthe
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Descriptive writing about people involves detailing physical appearance, behavior, mannerisms, and personal characteristics using vivid language.

sub_topics.short_notes: Kulemba mofotokozela maonekedwe ndi kufotokoza za munthu, cinthu kapena malo m'njira yomvetsetsa bwino. Descriptive writing is describing a person, thing or place in a clear and understandable way.

questions: Lembani cimangilizo mofotokozela maonekedwe pa mitu iyi: (i) Munthu wochuka kwambili (ii) Mphunzitsi amene amandisangalatsa
Lembani cimangilizo ca kulemba moyo wanu (Write a composition describing your life)

sub_topics.title: Kukambilana pa Zamalonda (Discussion on Business)
competences: Kugwilitsila nchito cilankhulo moyenela pakukambila pa zamalonda (Use appropriate language when discussing business)

teacher_steps: Ikani aphunzi m'timagulu ting'ono-ting'ono
Uzani aphunzi kusankha atsogoleli m'timagulu taoto
Pacikani chati pamene pali zithunzi-thunzi za malonda osiyana-siyana
Uzani aphunzi kuti akambilane pa mitundu ya malonda opezeka zinthuzi-thunzizo ndinso m'mene yacitkila
Patsani aphunzi mpata wokambilana pa zomwe alikuwona pazithunzi-thunzipo
Pemphani atsogoleli atimagulu tao kufotokozela zopeza zao
Konzani zolakwika zimene aphunzi angapeleke
learner_steps: Apenyetsetse pa chati pomwe pali zithunzi-thunzi za malonda osiyana-siyana
Akambilane pa zimene ali kuwona pa za mitunda ya malonda ndi momwe acitidwila
Afotokozele anzao zopeza zao kupoyolela muli atsogoleli am'timagulu tao
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Discussion on various types of businesses including agriculture, manufacturing, services, and retail. Understanding business vocabulary and concepts.

sub_topics.short_notes: Malonda ndi kucita zinthu zomwe zimabweletsa phindu. Business involves activities that generate profit.

questions: Mutu wopatsidwa pa zamalonda wakambidwa moyenela (The given business topic discussed appropriately)

sub_topics.title: Kuwelenga Nkhani ya Malonda (Reading Business Text)
competences: Kuwelenga nkhani zosiyana-siyana kulingana ndi muyeso wao mozama (Read various texts intensively according to their level)

teacher_steps: Ikani aphunzi m'magulu
Gawilani aphunzi mabuku ankhani ofunikilila kuwelengedwa
Funsani aphunzi awelenge nkhani
Funsani aphunzi mafunso osiyana-siyana okhudzana ndi nkhani yopatsidwayo
Wongolelani mayankho ena olakwika amene angapelekedwe ndi aphunzi
learner_steps: Alandile mabuku a nkhani ofunikilila kuwelengedwa
Ayankhe mafunso osiyana-siyana okhudzana ndi nkhani yopatsidwayo
Akonze mayankho ao ena olakwika amene angapelekedwe
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Comprehensive reading passage discussing different types of businesses (ulimi/agriculture, mayededwe/transport, zamamangidwe/construction, etc.), qualities of entrepreneurs, and challenges in business.

sub_topics.short_notes: Pa umoyo, munthu amalaka-laka zinthu zambili. Zinthuzo zina amazipeza yekha, koma zina nkosatheka kuzipeza yekha. Ndiye pazotele pakhumbika kupeza mwanjira ina. Ndipo njira imodzi mwa iyo ndi ya zamalonda. In life, people desire many things. Some they can obtain by themselves, but others are impossible to get alone. Therefore, it's necessary to find another way, and one such way is through business.

questions: Welengani ndi kufotokoza nkhani zimene mwawelenga mwacidule (Read and explain the story you read briefly)
Fupikitsani nkhani potsatila malamulo oyenela (Summarize the text following appropriate guidelines)

sub_topics.title: Kawelengedwe kamanambala (Reading Numbers)
competences: Kuwelenga kucokela modzi kufikila pa muyanda pena zikwiâ€“zikwi (Read from one to one thousand or thousands)

teacher_steps: Gwilitsani nchito timakhadi polembedwa manambala
Itanani mphunzi mmodziâ€“mmodzi kuwelenga manambala
Funsani aphunzi ena momwe manambalawo achulidwila
Ikani cipepala cacikulu polembedwapo manambala akulu-akulu ndipo akambilane ndi aphunzi zachulidwe kamanambalawo
Patsani aphunzi zocita
learner_steps: Aone pa cipepala cacikulu polembwapo manambala akulu-akulu ndipo akambilane ndi aphunzitsi kachulidwe kamanambalawo
instructional_blocks.short_notes: Learning to read and write numbers in Cinyanja from 1 to thousands, essential for business and daily transactions.

sub_topics.short_notes: Kudziwa kuwelenga manambala m'Cinyanja ndikofunikira kwambiri pa zamalonda ndi moyo watsiku ndi tsiku. Knowing how to read numbers in Cinyanja is very important for business and daily life.

questions: Lemba kachulidwe ka manambalawa: i) 3 ii) 11 iii) 92 iv) 523 v) 990
Lemba matanthauzo a mauawa m'manambala: i) Khumi ndi mphambu zisanu ndi ziwili ii) Makumi awili ndi mphambu zinai iii) Mazana asanu ndi makumi atatu ndi mphambuzi sanu ndi zinai
